TopicTitle: Default Mallard Intakes are Occluded when loaded at Island Airfield, but not at KSP runway or Dessert Airfield

Articles.Content: If you start a default sandbox, load the mallard from ksp or dessert runways, it runs great. But when you load the island airfield, the intakes are magically occluded by some gremlin in the engine. Ideas?

I did some quick testing.It happened the first time to me as well.

Hmm, did it still do it after you saved/loaded the game, replaced it or launched another aircraft with the same intake?

It looks it might have a really old version of the intake and after saving/loading it overwrites itself with the new correct version.

It was just a visual bug, the airspeed/drag/lift is the same in all runways.

Like  maybe this old version of this part couldnt understand where it spawned.

Edited May 2, 2018 by Boyster
